content: daffodil would you like your stem stiffer the crocheted stem isn t very stiff- you can stiffen it by soaking it with dilute pva glue white glue 1 1 ratio and allowing to dry alternatively you could wet felt your stem vigorously rub it in alternately very hot and very cold water this only works with with 100% wool that isn t superwash treated if you wet felt your stem you should do so before sewing it onto the flower *you are welcome to use this pattern for personal teaching or charity purpose please credit woollen wave if you do* tiny daffodil pattern version 1 23 march 2025 by woollen wave woollenwave@gmail com / https // www woollenwave co uk / @woollen_wave
